name: Tesla
description: The 'Tesla' is an electrically based handgun invented by and named after Nikola Tesla, as an alternative to bullets.
actionDescription: You pull the trigger of the Tesla and it charges. Electricity can be seen shooting around inside of the chamber it glows a bright bluish white until a dozen lightning bolts shoots from the tip! ZAP! ZAP! ZAP!
special: Shock for one turn if successful attack
